item.title: Getting Poetry to use the active Pyenv to Create a Virtual Environment
item.description: I found with a new poetry install that it refused to use the pyenv version of Python. I needed to explicitly tell Poetry where to find the active pyenv: poetry env use -- $(which python) After this, it works as expected. Source: https://github.com/python-poetry/poetry/issues/651#issuecomment-861421651 Get Regular Tips to Your Inbox My newsletter comes out every few weeks and is stuffed with helpful stories, tools and code showing how developers like yourself ship efficiently.
